Installing MLWorks

9 Setting up editor support

MLWorks supports a variety of external editors. The following sections of the main documentation describe how to set up editor support:

  • In the MLWorks Reference Manual, read the sections on the Shell.Editor structure and the Shell.Preferences structure.
  • In the MLWorks User Guide, read the section on "Editing ML Files" in Chapter 1.
